changes: Feature: Created `milestones.json` to store default milestone and event data.
Enhancement: The application now loads default data from `milestones.json` on startup.
Bugfix: Resolved an issue where a custom event's entrance animation would loop if the event was missed by the player.
Bugfix: Corrected the music pause functionality to use `Tone.Transport` for pausing and resuming audio.
Enhancement: Moved the version display from the footer to the main title.
Feature: Implemented dynamic loading of the version number from `version.py` into the footer.
Bugfix: Corrected the display location of the version number, ensuring it appears only in the footer and not on the game canvas.
Feature: Implemented music pause functionality when the game is paused.
Feature: Added a dynamic version footer to the application.
Bugfix: Resolved an issue where the 'Unpause' button label was not updating correctly.
Enhancement: Changed the 'Resume' button text to 'Unpause' when the game is paused.
Feature: Implemented pause and resume functionality. The game can be paused by pressing the 'P' key or by clicking the 'Pause' button, which replaces the 'Start' button during gameplay.
Bugfix: Exported the `startManualJump` function from `game.js` to resolve a module import error in `main.js`.
Bugfix: Exported the `gameRunning` variable from `game.js` to resolve a module import error in `main.js`.
Bugfix: Removed duplicate `startManualJump` function in `game.js` causing a fatal error.
Bugfix: Corrected a syntax error in `ui.js` that prevented the application from loading.
Refactor: Separated CSS and JavaScript into modular files from the monolithic `index.html`.
